name: vscode-weather-status-open-meteo
description: Displays current weather status as obtained form Open Meteo on the status bar

vscode-weather-status-open-meteo.info-no.description: Show a notification when updating weather settings.

vscode-weather-status-open-meteo.error-n.description: Show a notification if there is a problem updating weather settings.

vscode-weather-status-open-meteo.latitud.description: Latitude of the location to use in the request for weather conditions.

vscode-weather-status-open-meteo.longitu.description: Longitude of the location to use in the request for weather conditions.

vscode-weather-status-open-meteo.tempera.description: Choose the units to use for temperatures

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
